Notes.Text:
This update for mariadb fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2025-13699: Fixed MariaDB mariadb-dump utility vulnerable to 
  Path Traversal and Remote Code Execution (bsc#1254313)

Other fixes:

- Update to 10.6.24
Notes.Title: Details
